mapper.select:
select stui.id, stui.code, stui.name, stui.sex, stui.major_id, stui.class_id, stui.phone, stui.email, stui.content, stui.create_date, stui.images, stui.user_id, ci.name as className, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, ti.name as tieName, mi.name as majorName from student_info stui left join major_info mi on (mi.id = stui.major_id) left join class_info ci on (ci.id = stui.class_id) left join staff_info si on (si.id = ci.teacher_id) left join tie_info ti on (ti.id = ci.tie_id) where 1 = 1
AND stui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{studentInfo.name},'%')
AND ci.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{studentInfo.className},'%')
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{studentInfo.staffName},'%')
order by stui.create_date desc
